title: Teacher Education Course Design Applying Student-Activating Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A blended online-offline learning design using digital devices, promoting learner collaboration and self-reflection through activity-centered approaches.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three strategies for applying student-activation teaching methods in diverse educational environments.
Learners can analyze real educational cases to develop and demonstrate action plans for designing student-centered lessons.
Learners can monitor changes in their teaching methods and propose improvements using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
